content: long tail for sewing 2 legs starting with dark grey 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 5 single_crochet around 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing © icrochetthings 2014-2016 2 wings starting with black 1 chain 7 single_crochet across working on the opposite side of the chs single_crochet across 12 2 single_crochet increase around 18 3 2 single_crochet increase around 24 4 3 single_crochet increase around 30 5 6 single_crochet turn 6 6 10 single_crochet turn 10 7 9 single_crochet turn 9 8 8 single_crochet turn 8 9 7 single_crochet turn 7 10 6 single_crochet turn 6 11 5 single_crochet turn 5 12 4 single_crochet turn 4 13 3 single_crochet single_crochet down the side and around the round edge of the piece stopping when you reach row 7 f/o leave long tail for sewing 2 feet starting with dark grey first toe 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 5 single_crochet around 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing second toe work the same as the first toe do not f/o 6 single_crochet into one of the sts in the first toe single_crochet around the first toe single_crochet into the next st in the second toe single_crochet around the second toe 12 7 2 single_crochet decrease around 9 8 single_crochet around 9 use the leftover tail from the first toe to sew the hole between the toes shut 9 single_crochet decrease around 6 10 11 single_crochet around 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing sew shut © icrochetthings 2014-2016 assembly see pictures on next page if you need help with placement ▪ sew the beak onto the front of the head stuffing as you go ▪ sew the wings on either side of the body ▪ sew the feet onto the bottom of the legs ▪ sew the legs onto the bottom of the body stuffing as you go © icrochetthings 2014-2016 © icrochetthings 2014-2016
